com.talentica.hungryHippos.rdd

Class HHSparkContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext
      • com.talentica.hungryHippos.rdd.HHSparkContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class HHSparkContext
extends org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext
    HHSparkContext extends JavaSparkContext and provides additional support to interact with HungryHippo file system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HHSparkContext(org.apache.spark.SparkConf config, java.lang.String clientConfigurationFilePath)
      Creates and returns an instance of HHSparkContext and connects to the zookeeper.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HHSparkContext

        public HHSparkContext(org.apache.spark.SparkConf config,
                      java.lang.String clientConfigurationFilePath)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Creates and returns an instance of HHSparkContext and connects to the zookeeper.
        Parameters:
        config - a org.apache.spark.SparkConf object specifying Spark parameters
        clientConfigurationFilePath - a path to the client-config.xml for connecting to the zookeeper.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when client-config configuration file is not found
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - when the client-config configuration is not properly set for the HungryHippo file

    • Method Detail

      • binaryRecords

        public org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<byte[]> binaryRecords(java.lang.Integer[] jobDimensions,
                                                               java.lang.String hhFilePath,
                                                               boolean requiresShuffle)
                                                        throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                                                               java.io.IOException
        Returns a JavaRDD of byte array from HungryHippo file system.
        Parameters:
        jobDimensions - - An Integer array of indexes of the columns on which group by will be performed. Default dimension will be the first column.
        hhFilePath - - Path to the HungryHippo file
        requiresShuffle - - A value true will create optimal partitions of nearly 128MB each if possible. A value false will create optimal partitions according to the job dimensions.
        Returns:
        JavaRDD byte[] instance
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - when the sharding-table configuration is not properly set for the HungryHippo file
        java.io.IOException - Any of the usual Input/Output related exceptions.
